3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Overall excellent 3D conversion fundamentals. Wall thickness is good, interior volume is clear, and corner geometry is correct. The clean cutaway enhances visibility.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High geometric fidelity. Room configuration, adjacency, and proportions are accurately maintained. Major wall positions and internal partitions are correct. Doors and windows are mostly correct, with minor discrepancies in exact style matching the 2D plan, but functionality and placement are accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are highly accurate. All major furniture and fixtures from the 2D plan are present, in the correct rooms, and scaled appropriately. The kitchen and bathroom fixtures are well-represented.

visual_clarity.notes: The 3D render is very clear and legible. Walls, floors, and openings are easily distinguishable. Lighting is good, ensuring the interior is clearly visible without obscuring geometry. The background is clean but not entirely uniform in color, just a minor point.

summary: This 3D render is an excellent and geometrically faithful transformation of the input 2D floor plan, demonstrating high accuracy in structure, layout, and interior element placement with great visual clarity.
